text: Lassie Lou Ahern (June 25, 1920 - February 15, 2018) was an American former child actress and television actress. She was known for her role in Uncle Tom's Cabin. She made some guest appearances on television shows such as The Odd Couple. Ahern was born on June 25, 1920 in Los Angeles, California. She died of complications from influenza in Prescott, Arizona on February 15, 2018 at the age of 97.Lassie Lou Ahern, Child Actress in the 'Our Gang' Comedies, Dies at 97 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1920 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from influenza Category:Infectious disease deaths in Arizona Category:American silent movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Lassie Lou Ahern
